company.name: Royale Builders & Developers
company.description: Premium land developments, plotted layouts, and built spaces across Bangalore and Mysore.

about.heading: Crafting Spaces That Endure
about.para1: Royale Builders & Developers specializes in land aggregation and strategic partnerships. For nearly four decades, we have facilitated large-scale projects by joining forces with India’s leading developers.
about.para2: Today, our diversified portfolio includes land banks, residential layouts and apartments and our own commercial assets, with a growing presence in the development of industrial parks across India.
